world.item

Class ContainerStatTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.item.ContainerStatTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseManager.DatabaseTable

    public class ContainerStatTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseManager.DatabaseTable
    Holds the stats of different containers. Distinct from an instance of a container in that it has no location, bound items, etc. This table just stores the stats so that the data usage is minimized.
    Note, when it comes to maximum storage potential, any value (kg,l,#) can be null, and all not null values are applied
